ValidationRule.description: If the Payment Type is Credit Card, provide a Credit Card record. (Can apply to payments and charges)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISBLANK( OneCRM__Credit_Card__c ) && ISPICKVAL( OneCRM__Payment_Type__c , "Credit Card")) || (!ISBLANK( OneCRM__Credit_Card__c ) && !ISPICKVAL( OneCRM__Payment_Type__c , "Credit Card"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Credit card payments require a Credit Card to be referenced. Non-credit card payments should not reference a Credit Card.
